title: Trump’s Big Policy Bill Puts U.S. on Perilous Fiscal Path

title: Jury in Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Trial Reaches Verdict on All Counts but Racketeering Conspiracy
summary: The jury will keep deliberating on a racketeering conspiracy charge in the morning after saying there were “unpersuadable opinions on both sides.”

title: Lucy the Pig, a Celebrity on Staten Island, Can Stay at Home for Now
